Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE!!”

Reviews.Content: despite reading bad reports stayed mistake dont stayed bad life amount travelling begin firstly couldnt check 3pm left bags arranged meet staff 3pm checked etc waited rain 4pm apology excuse filthy bed hadnt cleaned ages awful smell bed sheets etc beds ourselves toliet paper soap partner 4 nights stay reception desk help dirty noisy literally beside oxford street reason booked accomodation else booked cheapest recommend thinking staying awful filthy hotel

Reviews.Title: “Take along antibacterial wipes and enjoy the location”
Reviews.Author: Uta H
Reviews.Content: dirty yes walltowall carpets tell clean bugs location safe filth humour arrival thorough doityourself cleaning session help antibacterial wipes cost 10 minutes pounds 2 packs wipes ok blackened chewing gum floor remained left socks time shower curtain indeed moldy water hot toilet ok clean nevertheless antibacterial swipe staff ok friendly arrived afternoon checkin affordable breakfast served little carfree square bond street underground minutes walking distance overall ivanhoe cheap bit strange spent money saved shopping food town hope soon grip sell else actually pearl enjoyable london weekend look sleep time

Reviews.Title: “Filthiest hotel we have ever seen!”

Reviews.Content: decent rat hole location fantastic 1 block oxford street shopping aside avoid hotel costs pretty cleaned past 10 bad checked fight receptionist phone front door locked scrap piece paper taped saying call mentioned booking details forced phone call dirty towels garbages grime previous visitor bed werent fresh sheets didnt blankets fear finding filth using towels blankets addition towels toilet paper neither bathroom mould hair floor walls previous vistors aswell basically aside decent price absolutely disgusting highly recommend setting foot
